name: Bad vibes must die!
description:
There is a party in town, but someone is ruining the party with their negative energy and bad vibes. You must save the party by finding that individual and putting a bullet through their head.

BAD VIBES MUST DIE!

This game was made for GoGodotJam 2. 

Theme: Energy Source

The civilian you're trying to kill is ruining the party with "negative energy" so it fits the theme well enough I hope.
